issues.description: The problem statement requires a public constructor for each class that takes all attributes defined in the UML (Ride must have a public constructor Ride(String name, char abbreviation) — see instructions). In the provided solution, Ride.java does not declare any constructor, but its concrete subclasses (RollerCoaster, LaunchedDropdownTower, LaunchedRollerCoaster) call super(name, abbreviation). This is a structural contradiction: the solution omits the required Ride constructor while other classes rely on it, which would prevent the intended inheritance-based construction and confuse students comparing the specification and the reference solution.
